snippet.title: NecroCity: Prologue - Gameplay Trailer | STEAM
snippet.description:
Play NecroCity: Prologue on March 6, 2023 on Steam! 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489310/NecroCity/

Welcome to NecroCity: Prologue, a mix of city building, strategy and tower defense. 🔥 Defend your undead outposts from the persistent forces of the so-called “good”! Show those living what rattles your bones with an army of skeletons! Show your older brother that you are no longer a child! File your taxes! 👹

---
#NecroCity #gameplay #gameplaytrailer
